title: Ambassador's Message
ambassadorPosition: Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Uzbekistan to the United Arab Emirates
paragraph1: I am pleased to present the website of the Embassy of the Republic of Uzbekistan in the United Arab Emirates. During the development of this website, we focused on making it simple and understandable, and tried to create convenience for you to familiarize yourself not only with the services of our embassy, but also with the main aspects of Uzbek-Arab relations and important developments.
paragraph2: It should be emphasized that the high-level cooperation between Uzbekistan and the United Arab Emirates over the years is now serving the prosperity of two friendly peoples. We continue to work on intensifying our cooperation in priority areas aimed at strengthening our fraternal relations with the UAE, including trade-economic, investment, and technological spheres.
paragraph3: We strive to further strengthen ties between our fraternal peoples through exchanges in culture, education and science, as well as supporting our positions in international events and organizations, taking into account the interests of the peoples of both countries.
paragraph4: We hope that by visiting our website, you will not only find useful and relevant information on various issues, but also discover a small piece of Uzbekistan for yourself.
